item.description:
The NBA FINALS begin in Boston Thurs, 6/5/08 @ 9pm! The Boston Celtics in Game #1 vs. the LA Lakers.
Don't miss a minute of this Playoff action between these two rival teams.
Game Time: 9:00 pm
Place: Sky Lounge & Bistro in Nashua.
http://www.skyloungen...

The game will be shown on all TV's, including the 14' x 8' Big Screen! Let's get a few tables and watch Game #1 together and watch Paul Pierce, Kevin Garnet and Ray Allen and the Team defeat the LA Lakers in the first game of what promises to be a very highly charged series!

The SkyLounge is happy to accommodate us. RSVP asap if you plan to attend.

Contact: Karen
Email: Tendronee@comcast.net
item.why: Let's show our loyalty to the Green and meetup at the Sky Lounge in Nashua NH for food/drinks and Playoff action.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Celtics vs the Lakers Game
